String.Source: Why would your fiance leave so soon?
String.Dest: 为什么你的未婚夫这么快就离开了?

String.Source: Why would your fiance leave so soon?
String.Dest: 为什么你的未婚夫这么快就离开了?

String.Source: Why would your fiance leave so soon?
String.Dest: 为什么你的未婚夫这么快就离开了?

String.Source: You could learn a thing or two by studying her habits.
String.Dest: 你可以从研究她的习性中学到一二。

String.Source: You could learn a thing or two by studying her habits.
String.Dest: 你可以从研究她的习性中学到一二。

String.Source: You could learn a thing or two by studying her habits.
String.Dest: 你可以从研究她的习性中学到一二。

String.Source: You should practice swinging, not singing. Pantea may ask you to raid a cave.
String.Dest: 你该练习挥剑而不是演唱。潘提亚可能会要求你袭击一个洞穴.

String.Source: You said you never aspired to be a bard, but you moved halfway across Tamriel.
String.Dest: 你说你从来没有渴望成为一名吟游诗人，但你感动了整个泰姆瑞尔大陆一半的人。

String.Source: You said you never aspired to be a bard, but you moved halfway across Tamriel.
String.Dest: 你说你从来没有渴望成为一名吟游诗人，但你感动了整个泰姆瑞尔大陆一半的人。

String.Source: You said you never aspired to be a bard, but you moved halfway across Tamriel.
String.Dest: 你说你从来没有渴望成为一名吟游诗人，但你感动了整个泰姆瑞尔大陆一半的人。

String.Source: You said you never aspired to be a bard, but you moved halfway across Tamriel.
String.Dest: 你说你从来没有渴望成为一名吟游诗人，但你感动了整个泰姆瑞尔大陆一半的人。

String.Source: What sort of things could affect your voice?
String.Dest: 什么样的事物会影响到你的声音？

String.Source: What sort of things could affect your voice?
String.Dest: 什么样的事物会影响到你的声音？

String.Source: What sort of things could affect your voice?
String.Dest: 什么样的事物会影响到你的声音？

String.Source: You need to be more assertive. Demand an audition or it'll never come.
String.Dest: 你需要更自信点。要求一个机会，不然永不会成功。

String.Source: You need to be more assertive. Demand an audition or it'll never come.
String.Dest: 你需要更自信点。要求一个机会，不然永不会成功。

String.Source: You need to be more assertive. Demand an audition or it'll never come.
String.Dest: 你需要更自信点。要求一个机会，不然永不会成功。

String.Source: Angeline could probably brew up a potion of glibness for you.
String.Dest: 安吉莉娜可能酿造了对你花言巧语的药水。

String.Source: Angeline could probably brew up a potion of glibness for you.
String.Dest: 安吉莉娜可能酿造了对你花言巧语的药水。

String.Source: I'd like to hear your voice.
String.Dest: 我就喜欢听你的声音。

String.Source: That...was surprisingly good.
String.Dest: 那……好得令人惊讶。

String.Source: How about "Ragnar the Red."
String.Dest: 《红衣拉格纳》怎么样。

String.Source: How about "Ragnar the Red."
String.Dest: 《红衣拉格纳》怎么样。

String.Source: I didn't care for the song, but your voice is impressive.
String.Dest: 我不在乎这首歌，但你的嗓音印象深刻。

String.Source: Why is clinging to hope so important to you?
String.Dest: 为何紧握希望对你如此重要？

String.Source: Why is clinging to hope so important to you?
String.Dest: 为何紧握希望对你如此重要？

String.Source: Why is clinging to hope so important to you?
String.Dest: 为何紧握希望对你如此重要？

String.Source: If you don't hurry, Pantea may forget your audition altogether.
String.Dest: 如果你不快点，潘提亚会彻底忘记你的声音。

String.Source: If you don't hurry, Pantea may forget your audition altogether.
String.Dest: 如果你不快点，潘提亚会彻底忘记你的声音。

String.Source: If you don't hurry, Pantea may forget your audition altogether.
String.Dest: 如果你不快点，潘提亚会彻底忘记你的声音。

String.Source: If you don't hurry, Pantea may forget your audition altogether.
String.Dest: 如果你不快点，潘提亚会彻底忘记你的声音。

String.Source: If you don't hurry, Pantea may forget your audition altogether.
String.Dest: 如果你不快点，潘提亚会彻底忘记你的声音。

String.Source: If you don't hurry, Pantea may forget your audition altogether.
String.Dest: 如果你不快点，潘提亚会彻底忘记你的声音。

String.Source: If you don't hurry, Pantea may forget your audition altogether.
String.Dest: 如果你不快点，潘提亚会彻底忘记你的声音。

String.Source: That song about the Dragonborn has always been a favorite of mine.
String.Dest: 那首关于龙裔的歌一直都是我的最爱。

String.Source: That song about the Dragonborn has always been a favorite of mine.
String.Dest: 那首关于龙裔的歌一直都是我的最爱。

String.Source: That song about the Dragonborn has always been a favorite of mine.
String.Dest: 那首关于龙裔的歌一直都是我的最爱。

String.Source: That song about the Dragonborn has always been a favorite of mine.
String.Dest: 那首关于龙裔的歌一直都是我的最爱。

String.Source: That song about the Dragonborn has always been a favorite of mine.
String.Dest: 那首关于龙裔的歌一直都是我的最爱。

String.Source: That song about the Dragonborn has always been a favorite of mine.
String.Dest: 那首关于龙裔的歌一直都是我的最爱。

String.Source: Have you been accepted into the college?
String.Dest: 你有被学院接收过吗？

String.Source: Have you been accepted into the college?
String.Dest: 你有被学院接收过吗？

String.Source: Have you been accepted into the college?
String.Dest: 你有被学院接收过吗？

String.Source: Were you born in Haafingar?
String.Dest: 你出生在海尔芬加吗？

String.Source: Were you born in Haafingar?
String.Dest: 你出生在海尔芬加吗？

String.Source: Were you born in Haafingar?
String.Dest: 你出生在海尔芬加吗？

String.Source: Were you born in Haafingar?
String.Dest: 你出生在海尔芬加吗？

String.Source: Were you born in Haafingar?
String.Dest: 你出生在海尔芬加吗？

String.Source: Were you born in Haafingar?
String.Dest: 你出生在海尔芬加吗？

String.Source: Were you born in Haafingar?
String.Dest: 你出生在海尔芬加吗？

String.Source: Were you born in Haafingar?
String.Dest: 你出生在海尔芬加吗？

String.Source: Nirnroot are moist. But they might drown out your voice with their chime.
String.Dest: 耐恩根是有润喉的作用。不过它们自己的响声恐怕都盖过你的嗓音了。

String.Source: No, we can never be friends. Not until you slay 12 ice wraiths in my name.
String.Dest: 不，我们不能做朋友。除非你以我的名义杀死 12 只冰怨灵。

String.Source: No, we can never be friends. Not until you slay 12 ice wraiths in my name.
String.Dest: 不，我们不能做朋友。除非你以我的名义杀死 12 只冰怨灵。

String.Source: And how is it different for you?
String.Dest: 那这对你而言有什么不同呢？

String.Source: And how is it different for you?
String.Dest: 那这对你而言有什么不同呢？

String.Source: And how is it different for you?
String.Dest: 那这对你而言有什么不同呢？

String.Source: You're probably right, but I can't afford something that fancy.
String.Dest: 你大概是对的，但我负担不起那么昂贵的东西。

String.Source: And I'd feel bad asking Angeline for a favor, especially after all she did for me when I was sick.
String.Dest: 我并不好意思因为自己的喜好而询问安吉琳，尤其是在她在我病弱之时对我那些照料之后。

String.Source: I just wanted to feel what it was like to run through the snow. And just once, maybe dive into it.
String.Dest: 我只是想知道穿过积雪会是怎样的感觉。一次就好，也许要跳进去。

String.Source: We packed our things and boarded a ship to Solitude. At the time he told me he sold the family farm. It was so romantic.
String.Dest: 我们带着行李，登上了一艘开往独孤城的船。在那时他告诉我他卖掉了家里的农场。这真是太浪漫了。

String.Source: Only it's not a dream, it's right there in front of me.
String.Dest: 这不是一个梦，它就在我的面前。

String.Source: Huh? I'm sorry, you lost me. You want me to do what exactly? Wait, before you say anything, should I write this down?
String.Dest: 呃？抱歉，我没听懂。你想让我做什么来着？等等，在你说之前，我算不算应该准备好笔记？

String.Source: At least not in public anyway.
String.Dest: 至少别在公开场合吧。

String.Source: It's an end to the evil, and all flying foes! Beware, beware, the Dragonborn comes...
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】他荡涤邪恶，战胜所有的敌人！请一定注意，龙裔即将归来...

String.Source: I think Corpulus has some paper and...you were joking. By the mountains of Dragontail, I am so dense.
String.Dest: 我想考皮勒斯会有些这类的文章，不过...你在开玩笑吧。在龙尾山脉旁边，我真蠢。

String.Source: I know the lyrics need some work, but you're right, I think the melody really brings out the strength of my vocals.
String.Dest: 我知道歌词还需要一些修改，但是你是对的，这首歌的旋律牵动着我的呼吸。

String.Source: I wanted to be somewhere grand, with walls that went on forever and parapets that tickled the sky. Mostly though, I just wanted to leave Hammerfell.
String.Dest: 我想去一个更繁荣的地方，壁垒绵延不绝，护墙触及天空。尽管大体上，我只想离开落锤省。

String.Source: I guess I'm just worried that if I annoy her enough, she'll deny my admittance before I even finish my warm-up.
String.Dest: 我认为我只是在担心如果我一直骚扰她，她会不会在我完成热身运动前就不让我入场了。

String.Source: (Laughs) I suppose it would be quite irritating. I didn't plan on singing with it in my mouth though.
String.Dest: (笑声)我感觉这挺刺激的。但我不打算从自己嘴里唱出来。

String.Source: Which is completely understandable. I imagine a Master Vocalist must have a very hectic schedule.
String.Dest: 完全理解。我猜声乐大师一定有个非常忙碌的日程表。

String.Source: Really? Who? What are they saying?
String.Dest: 真的？谁？他们在说什么？

String.Source: Oh, there once was a hero named Ragnar the Red, who came riding to Whiterun from ole Rorikstead!
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】哦，曾经有位名叫“红衣拉格纳”的英雄，他从美丽的洛利克镇一路骑马来到白漫城！

String.Source: You mean, sing? Right here? Um, okay, but my voice is a little hoarse from practicing. Is there anything in particular you want to hear?
String.Dest: 你的意思是，歌么，好吧，虽然我的声音在练习中变得有点嘶哑...有什么你想听的么。

String.Source: My voice has a tendency to get hoarse when I get really nervous. And I still haven't fully recovered from that rust chancre I caught a season ago.
String.Dest: 当我紧张时我的声音会变沙哑。上个季节我得的性病还没完全恢复。

String.Source: My voice has a tendency to get hoarse when I get really nervous. And I still haven't fully recovered from that rust chancre I caught a season ago.
String.Dest: 当我紧张时我的声音会变沙哑。上个季节我得的性病还没完全恢复。

String.Source: It reminds me too much of the docks, and how I'm one bad audition away from leaving Skyrim.
String.Dest: 这让我想起了码头，还有我这个听力糟糕的家伙是怎么得以从天际省离开的。

String.Source: My fiance at the time came with me. He stuck it out here in Skyrim for a few months, but eventually boarded a ship head back home.
String.Dest: 我当时的未婚夫跟我一起来了。他在天际省坚持了几个月，但最终登上一条船回了老家。

String.Source: I don't know, I don't think the head vocalist would like it. I'm still not officially a student yet, you know.
String.Dest: 我不知道，我不认为主唱歌手会喜欢它的。我还不是一名正式的学生呢，你知道的。

String.Source: Well I know, for instance, that mead dries the throat and milk tends to clog it. I've also been trying to drink plenty of water and avoid the hearth.
String.Dest: 我知道，比如蜜酒让人嗓子干，牛奶让人喉咙堵。我也一直尽量多喝水、避免接近壁炉。

String.Source: Well I know, for instance, that mead dries the throat and milk tends to clog it. I've also been trying to drink plenty of water and avoid the hearth.
String.Dest: 我知道，比如蜜酒让人嗓子干，牛奶让人喉咙堵。我也一直尽量多喝水、避免接近壁炉。

String.Source: Now that I'm here, I don't want to lose that. I don't want to lose this. And it's so silly, because I never wanted to be a bard.
String.Dest: 现在我就在这里，我不想失去它。我不忍失去它。可是这真蠢，因为我从未想过做一名诗人。

String.Source: They might as well say they want to be an apple. It's just some vague possibility, some murky future.
String.Dest: 他们可能会说他们想做一个苹果。这只是一些不太明确的可能性，一些不确定的未来。

String.Source: I wanted to shop for long coats, drink hot stew, and huddle by a fireplace during the winter. Skyrim was the obvious choice.
String.Dest: 我真想在冬天穿着厚重的外套，喝着热汤，围坐在火堆旁。天际显然是最好的选择。

String.Source: My fiance grew impatient. He expected us to be back in Hammerfell before the crops were in season. I should've known he wouldn't sell the farm.
String.Dest: 我的未婚夫有些不耐烦了，他希望我们在庄稼当季之前回到落锤省。我早该想到他不会把农场卖了。

String.Source: But for children it doesn't really mean anything. If they say they want to be a bard, or a Jarl, it's just an answer to a question.
String.Dest: 但是对于孩子们来说这真的不算什么。就算他们说想成为一个吟游诗人，想成为一个领主，那也只是随口说说而已。

String.Source: I'll do my best, but I'm not sure of all the lines.
String.Dest: 我尽力，我不太确定我是否还记得所有歌词。

String.Source: One of the bards from the college suggested chewing on nirnroot, but I wasn't sure if he was serious.
String.Dest: 学院里的一位诗人建议我嚼些奈恩之根，我不太确定他是不是在开玩笑。

String.Source: One of the bards from the college suggested chewing on nirnroot, but I wasn't sure if he was serious.
String.Dest: 学院里的一位诗人建议我嚼些奈恩之根，我不太确定他是不是在开玩笑。

String.Source: For the darkness has passed, and...and...ah I forgot the rest. I'm really sorry. Sincerely so.
String.Dest: 因为黑暗已经过去，还有...还有...啊剩下的我忘了。真对不起。真心的。

String.Source: For someone like me, being here in this moment, in this city, there's something about it that's so impossibly magical.
String.Dest: 对于像我这样的人，在这里，在这个时刻，在这个城市里，有些事情，是那么不可思议的神奇。

String.Source: I know, I know, I have a tendency to over-think things too.
String.Dest: 我知道，我知道，我也很容易把事情想的太复杂。

String.Source: But at some point on the journey here, I caught a severe case of rust chancre. I had a rash on my forearms, and swelling around my cheeks.
String.Dest: 但是在这旅途中，我得了性病，情况不容乐观。我前肢起疹子，臀部附近也变肿了。

String.Source: Oh no, I came here on a ship from Lainlyn, near Iliac Bay in Hammerfell. I didn't come alone though.
String.Dest: 哦不，我是坐船来这儿的，那里靠近落锤省的髂骨海湾。我还有一群同伴跟我一起来。

String.Source: I know hope's something you feed children mostly, this idea that you can be whatever you want to be.
String.Dest: 我知道你教会孩子们希望才是最重要的，他们可以成为自己想成为的任何人。

String.Source: Ever since then I try and stay inside in the mornings, when the briney air wafts in from the ocean.
String.Dest: 从那之后，当带着咸味的空气从海上吹过来的时候，我就一直试着早上呆在里面。

String.Source: Are you alright? That Orc meant to kill you.
String.Dest: 没事吧? 那个兽人想要杀了你。

String.Source: Are you alright? That Orc meant to kill you.
String.Dest: 没事吧? 那个兽人想要杀了你。

String.Source: You selfish fool. Your fiance deserves better and is lucky to be rid of you.
String.Dest: 你这个自私的蠢货。你的未婚夫理应过得更好，他能甩了你还真是幸运。

String.Source: How would you feel if you didn't make it?
String.Dest: 如果你连做的不去做的话那你哪还会有感觉？

String.Source: How would you feel if you didn't make it?
String.Dest: 如果你连做的不去做的话那你哪还会有感觉？

String.Source: How would you feel if you didn't make it?
String.Dest: 如果你连做的不去做的话那你哪还会有感觉？

String.Source: How would you feel if you didn't make it?
String.Dest: 如果你连做的不去做的话那你哪还会有感觉？

String.Source: How would you feel if you didn't make it?
String.Dest: 如果你连做的不去做的话那你哪还会有感觉？

String.Source: I want to hear something original.
String.Dest: 我想听真话。

String.Source: I want to hear something original.
String.Dest: 我想听真话。

String.Source: I want to hear something original.
String.Dest: 我想听真话。

String.Source: I want to hear something original.
String.Dest: 我想听真话。

String.Source: I want to hear something original.
String.Dest: 我想听真话。

String.Source: I want to hear something original.
String.Dest: 我想听真话。

String.Source: I want to hear something original.
String.Dest: 我想听真话。

String.Source: I want to hear something original.
String.Dest: 我想听真话。

String.Source: I want to hear something original.
String.Dest: 我想听真话。

String.Source: I want to hear something original.
String.Dest: 我想听真话。

String.Source: I want to hear something original.
String.Dest: 我想听真话。

String.Source: I want to hear something original.
String.Dest: 我想听真话。

String.Source: I want to hear something original.
String.Dest: 我想听真话。

String.Source: I want to hear something original.
String.Dest: 我想听真话。

String.Source: It's one thing to enjoy the journey, it's another to walk in circles.
String.Dest: 第一，享受旅途，第二，随便逛逛。

String.Source: It's one thing to enjoy the journey, it's another to walk in circles.
String.Dest: 第一，享受旅途，第二，随便逛逛。

String.Source: It's one thing to enjoy the journey, it's another to walk in circles.
String.Dest: 第一，享受旅途，第二，随便逛逛。

String.Source: Then you need to overcome this fear of losing your dream.
String.Dest: 那么你需要克服梦想丧失的恐惧。

String.Source: Then you need to overcome this fear of losing your dream.
String.Dest: 那么你需要克服梦想丧失的恐惧。

String.Source: Then you need to overcome this fear of losing your dream.
String.Dest: 那么你需要克服梦想丧失的恐惧。

String.Source: Then you need to overcome this fear of losing your dream.
String.Dest: 那么你需要克服梦想丧失的恐惧。

String.Source: Then you need to overcome this fear of losing your dream.
String.Dest: 那么你需要克服梦想丧失的恐惧。

String.Source: Don't worry. There's no one after you. He did it as a lark, but I stopped him.
String.Dest: 别担心。没有人跟着你。他跑起来像只鸟一样，但我阻止他了。

String.Source: I don't know about Lisette, but your voice sounds a bit rough for a singer.
String.Dest: 我倒不认识丽赛特，只是听你的嗓子要当歌手还是粗了点儿。

String.Source: I don't know about Lisette, but your voice sounds a bit rough for a singer.
String.Dest: 我倒不认识丽赛特，只是听你的嗓子要当歌手还是粗了点儿。

String.Source: I don't know about Lisette, but your voice sounds a bit rough for a singer.
String.Dest: 我倒不认识丽赛特，只是听你的嗓子要当歌手还是粗了点儿。

String.Source: Sounds to me like you're afraid of rejection.
String.Dest: 我听起来像是你害怕被拒绝。

String.Source: Sounds to me like you're afraid of rejection.
String.Dest: 我听起来像是你害怕被拒绝。

String.Source: Sounds to me like you're afraid of rejection.
String.Dest: 我听起来像是你害怕被拒绝。

String.Source: How about "Ragnar the Red."
String.Dest: 《红衣拉格纳》怎么样。

String.Source: How about "Ragnar the Red."
String.Dest: 《红衣拉格纳》怎么样。

String.Source: How about "Ragnar the Red."
String.Dest: 《红衣拉格纳》怎么样。

String.Source: How about "Ragnar the Red."
String.Dest: 《红衣拉格纳》怎么样。

String.Source: How about "Ragnar the Red."
String.Dest: 《红衣拉格纳》怎么样。

String.Source: How about "Ragnar the Red."
String.Dest: 《红衣拉格纳》怎么样。

String.Source: That was horrifyingly bad.
String.Dest: 真是糟糕至极，令人震惊。

String.Source: Someone of your beauty deserves better.
String.Dest: 像你这样的美人理应得到更好的。

String.Source: Someone of your beauty deserves better.
String.Dest: 像你这样的美人理应得到更好的。

String.Source: Someone of your beauty deserves better.
String.Dest: 像你这样的美人理应得到更好的。

String.Source: Someone of your beauty deserves better.
String.Dest: 像你这样的美人理应得到更好的。

String.Source: Someone of your beauty deserves better.
String.Dest: 像你这样的美人理应得到更好的。

String.Source: Sorry. You only get one chance to screw up a first impression.
String.Dest: 对不起。你只有一次机会搞砸你的第一印象。

String.Source: But after hearing it a number of times from different people, you start to think there's something to it. So here I am.
String.Dest: 但是，从不同的人口中听到了它那么多次，你也开始觉得这里有什么东西了吧？所以我在这里。

String.Source: I'm scared I'll wake up one morning and there won't be a need for vocal training. I'm worried one day I won't have a reason to borrow Geraud's books.
String.Dest: 我很怕有一天醒来之后，发现世界上都不需要声音训练师了。我怕我会失去借热罗之书的理由。

String.Source: And I guess I'll miss meeting the travelers. The people like yourself as it were, even if I'm so dreadful at meeting them.
String.Dest: 我猜以后我会怀念与旅行者的会面，就是像你这类的人，就算我面对他们的时候会感到不爽。

String.Source: And the braggart named Ragnar was boastful no moooooree... when his ugly red head rolled around on the floor!
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】牛皮王拉格纳不能再自夸……他的红脑袋摔成了一堆渣！

String.Source: For a hero does walk the land, walk the land, walk the land, a hero does walk the land, and the dragons will flee.
String.Dest: 当一个英雄在路上，在路上，在路上，一个英雄在路上，龙就逃跑咯。

String.Source: For a hero does walk the land, walk the land, walk the land, a hero does walk the land, and the dragons will flee.
String.Dest: 当一个英雄在路上，在路上，在路上，一个英雄在路上，龙就逃跑咯。

String.Source: I'd be somewhat relieved, a tad angry, but mostly sad.
String.Dest: 我会轻松些，还有点气儿没消，但主要还是伤心。

String.Source: And I'll miss meeting the travelers, the people like yourself I guess, even if I'm so dreadful at meeting them.
String.Dest: 而我也将想念那些旅行者，大概就像你这样的我想，就算平时遇见他们我都很害怕。

String.Source: (Stops Playing)
String.Dest: (停止演奏)

String.Source: You're right. I...don't like the sound of my own voice. Then again, nobody likes the way their voice sounds. Not even bards.
String.Dest: 你说得对。我不喜欢自己的声音。不过，也没人喜欢自己的声音吧。即使是吟游诗人也是这样。

String.Source: Not about losing a chance to be a bard, but having to say goodbye. I'll miss Gulum-Ei's silver tongue, and Octieve's drunken walk.
String.Dest: 我不想失去成为吟遊诗人的机会，但却不得不跟它说再见了。我会怀念古鲁姆·埃的巧舌如簧，还有欧克提夫酒醉走路的样子。

String.Source: Not about losing a chance to be a bard, but having to say goodbye. I'll miss Gulum-Ei's silver tongue, and Octieve's drunken walk.
String.Dest: 我不想失去成为吟遊诗人的机会，但却不得不跟它说再见了。我会怀念古鲁姆·埃的巧舌如簧，还有欧克提夫酒醉走路的样子。

String.Source: You mean...like a song that I wrote? Oh...I'm not that talented. I mean, I've written a few lyrics, and there's sort of a melody.
String.Dest: 你的意思是...像我写的那首歌吗？哦...我不是天才。我的意思是，我已经写了一些歌词，还配了一个谱子。

String.Source: You mean...like a song that I wrote? Oh...I'm not that talented. I mean, I've written a few lyrics, and there's sort of a melody.
String.Dest: 你的意思是...像我写的那首歌吗？哦...我不是天才。我的意思是，我已经写了一些歌词，还配了一个谱子。

String.Source: Flowers bloom on the land, children walk hand in hand, sun shining on white sand, to Skyrim comes peace.
String.Dest: 鲜花盛开在这片土地，孩子们手牵手走在路上，太阳照耀着白色的沙滩，天际迎来了和平。

String.Source: Flowers bloom on the land, children walk hand in hand, sun shining on white sand, to Skyrim comes peace.
String.Dest: 鲜花盛开在这片土地，孩子们手牵手走在路上，太阳照耀着白色的沙滩，天际迎来了和平。

String.Source: Oh, okay...um...I didn't...I mean...I guess what I'm saying is...thank you.
String.Dest: 哦，好吧……嗯……我没……我的意思是……我想说……谢谢你。

String.Source: And so then came the clashing and slashing of steel, as the brave lass Matilda charged in full of zeal!
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】刀剑碰撞叮当响，勇敢的少女玛提尔达不可挡！

String.Source: You're right. I thought about how I'd feel if Pantea denied my admittance. I'd be somewhat relieved, a tad angry, but mostly sad.
String.Dest: 你说得对。我在想，如果潘提亚拒绝我进去，我会有什么感觉。我会有轻松，有些生气，但更多的是悲伤。

String.Source: Oh, you talk and you lie and you drink all our mead! Now I think it's high time that you lie down and bleed!
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】噢，你吹牛喝酒耍活宝！真有种就不要跑！

String.Source: A child prayed unto the Gods, save the land, save the land, and the Gods said unto the child, to Skyrim comes spring.
String.Dest: 孺子向神明祷告，求您救救这块土地吧，救救这块土地吧，神明对孩子说，天际之春已踏步而来。

String.Source: A child prayed unto the Gods, save the land, save the land, and the Gods said unto the child, to Skyrim comes spring.
String.Dest: 孺子向神明祷告，求您救救这块土地吧，救救这块土地吧，神明对孩子说，天际之春已踏步而来。

String.Source: Snow falls on all the land, all the land, all the land, snow falls on all the land, shrouded by dark wings.
String.Dest: 雪覆大地，雪覆大地，白雪覆盖一切，再由黑翼披上寿衣。

String.Source: Snow falls on all the land, all the land, all the land, snow falls on all the land, shrouded by dark wings.
String.Dest: 雪覆大地，雪覆大地，白雪覆盖一切，再由黑翼披上寿衣。

String.Source: And the braggart did swagger and brandish his blade, as he told of bold battles and gold he had made!
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】他气势汹汹挥舞着他的剑，吹嘘英勇事迹神气活现！

String.Source: Alright, here goes...
String.Dest: 好嘞，来啦~

String.Source: I'll miss how little Minette pretends to know the things she doesn't, and acts ignorant of the things she does.
String.Dest: 我会怀念那总是不懂装懂，做出与她的无知相称的举动的小米内蒂的。

String.Source: I'll miss how little Minette pretends to know the things she doesn't, and acts ignorant of the things she does.
String.Dest: 我会怀念那总是不懂装懂，做出与她的无知相称的举动的小米内蒂的。

String.Source: How about I sing it, and you can give me some guidance as to whether it's good. Alright, here goes...
String.Dest: 这样怎么样，我来唱，然后你可以关于好坏与否给我一些指导。好吧，那么开始...

String.Source: How about I sing it, and you can give me some guidance as to whether it's good. Alright, here goes...
String.Dest: 这样怎么样，我来唱，然后你可以关于好坏与否给我一些指导。好吧，那么开始...

String.Source: And my friends have all said that I have a great singing voice. I suppose they should, because that's what friends do.
String.Dest: 我的朋友都说我有一个美妙的歌喉。我想他们应该这么说，因为我们是朋友。

String.Source: And the older you get, the less you want them.
String.Dest: 而且你年纪越大，就越是不想要这些东西。

String.Source: But then he went quiet, did Ragnar the Red, when he met the shield-maiden Matilda who said...
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】红衣拉格纳后来变了哑巴，全因他遇到盾牌女仆玛提尔达，她说……

String.Source: Although I can't compete with some of the females around here. I think Taarie and Endarie, for instance, are gorgeous.
String.Dest: 尽管我不与在这附近的女性竞争，但她们都挺华丽的，比如塔瑞和恩达蕊。

String.Source: Viarmo calling everyone a fool, or trying to comb that thick hedge of hair. Sorex's awkward flirting, and Vivienne's sharp rebukes.
String.Dest: 维阿墨把所有人都叫做蠢蛋，还试图将浓密的毛发梳理干净。索莱克斯尴尬地和他调情，维维恩尼则尖锐地指责他。

String.Source: Viarmo calling everyone a fool, or trying to comb that thick hedge of hair. Sorex's awkward flirting, and Vivienne's sharp rebukes.
String.Dest: 维阿墨把所有人都叫做蠢蛋，还总是试图将浓密的毛发梳理干净。索莱克斯总是在尴尬地调情，维维恩尼则总是在尖锐地指责别人。

String.Source: Y-you mean...Oh no...
String.Dest: 你……你是说……哦不……

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: It's alright. Not everyone can be a bard.
String.Dest: 沒关系，不是每个人都能成为吟游诗人的。

String.Source: It's alright. Not everyone can be a bard.
String.Dest: 没关系，不是每个人都能成为吟游诗人的。

String.Source: It's alright. Not everyone can be a bard.
String.Dest: 没关系，不是每个人都能成为吟游诗人的。

String.Source: The bard that works here? Yes, I enjoy her voice.
String.Dest: 那位诗人在这儿工作吗？噢，是的，我很喜欢她的声音。

String.Source: The bard that works here? Yes, I enjoy her voice.
String.Dest: 那位诗人在这儿工作吗？噢，是的，我很喜欢她的声音。

String.Source: The bard that works here? Yes, I enjoy her voice.
String.Dest: 那位诗人在这儿工作吗？噢，是的，我很喜欢她的声音。

String.Source: The bard that works here? Yes, I enjoy her voice.
String.Dest: 那位诗人在这儿工作吗？噢，是的，我很喜欢她的声音。

String.Source: You don't have to compare yourself to others.
String.Dest: 你没必要拿自己跟别人比。

String.Source: You don't have to compare yourself to others.
String.Dest: 你没必要拿自己跟别人比。

String.Source: You don't have to compare yourself to others.
String.Dest: 你没必要拿自己跟别人比。

String.Source: Sure. Well met, person I've never spoken to.
String.Dest: 当然。你好啊，陌生人。

String.Source: Sure. Well met, person I've never spoken to.
String.Dest: 当然。你好啊，陌生人。

String.Source: How did the bard's lessons go?
String.Dest: 吟游诗人课程进行得怎样？

String.Source: How did the bard's lessons go?
String.Dest: 吟游诗人课程进行得怎样？

String.Source: Do you play any instruments?
String.Dest: 你会演奏什么乐器吗？

String.Source: Do you play any instruments?
String.Dest: 你会演奏什么乐器吗？

String.Source: Do you play any instruments?
String.Dest: 你会演奏什么乐器吗？

String.Source: Do you play any instruments?
String.Dest: 你会演奏什么乐器吗？

String.Source: Do you play any instruments?
String.Dest: 你会演奏什么乐器吗？

String.Source: And I really have no real aspirations to become a bard. Never even thought about it. I'm perfectly happy just being Netta the milkmaid.
String.Dest: 而且我是真没那份心思去做什么诗人。从来就没想过。我做个养牛女仆就非常满足了。

String.Source: But after hearing it a number of times from different people, you start to think there's something to it. So here I am.
String.Dest: 但是，从不同的人口中听到了它那么多次，你也开始觉得这里有什么东西了吧？所以我在这里。

String.Source: But after hearing it a number of times from different people, you start to think there's something to it. So here I am.
String.Dest: 但是，从不同的人口中听到了它那么多次，你也开始觉得这里有什么东西了吧？所以我在这里。

String.Source: Lisette, now there's a bard. She has such a calm and soothing voice.
String.Dest: 丽赛特，现在这儿有位吟游诗人了。她的嗓音特别平和且舒缓。

String.Source: I didn't know what to do with it, as I had no idea how to play. But a bard on the ship from Hammerfell took pity on me.
String.Dest: 我不知道做什么，我都不知道怎么去演奏。但一位从落锤城坐船来的吟游诗人同情着我。

String.Source: I guess what I'm saying is, I don't like the sound of my own voice. But then again, nobody likes the way their voice sounds. Not even bards.
String.Dest: 我是说我的意思是指...我不喜欢的是我自己的音色。当然与此同时，谁听自己的嗓音都不会喜欢。就算是吟游诗人。

String.Source: For a hero does walk the land, walk the land, walk the land, a hero does walk the land, and the dragons will flee.
String.Dest: 当一个英雄在路上，在路上，在路上，一个英雄在路上，龙就逃跑咯。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: La-la-la-la-la-laaa....Oh! Sorry, just stretching out the vocal chords.
String.Dest: 啦-啦-啦-啦-啦-啦-啦～～……喔！抱歉，只是吊一下嗓子。

String.Source: F-Farewell.
String.Dest: 慢、慢走。

String.Source: The lute I have was my grandmother's. It turns out she was once a bard who studied at the College here in the city.
String.Dest: 我所拥有的鲁特琴原本属于我的祖母。这样看来她曾经是个吟游诗人，也曾经在这座城市的学院中学习过。

String.Source: Flowers bloom on the land, children walk hand in hand, sun shining on white sand, to Skyrim comes peace.
String.Dest: 鲜花盛开在这片土地，孩子们手牵手走在路上，太阳照耀着白色的沙滩，天际迎来了和平。

String.Source: Oh, there once was a hero named Ragnar the Red, who came riding to Whiterun from ole Rorikstead!
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】哦，曾经有位名叫“红衣拉格纳”的英雄，他从美丽的洛利克镇一路骑马来到白漫城！

String.Source: And so then came the clashing and slashing of steel, as the brave lass Matilda charged in full of zeal!
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】刀剑碰撞叮当响，勇敢的少女玛提尔达不可挡！

String.Source: Oh, you talk and you lie and you drink all our mead! Now I think it's high time that you lie down and bleed!
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】噢，你吹牛喝酒耍活宝！真有种就不要跑！

String.Source: A child prayed unto the Gods, save the land, save the land, and the Gods said unto the child, to Skyrim comes spring.
String.Dest: 孺子向神明祷告，求您救救这块土地吧，救救这块土地吧，神明对孩子说，天际之春已踏步而来。

String.Source: Snow falls on all the land, all the land, all the land, snow falls on all the land, shrouded by dark wings.
String.Dest: 雪覆大地，雪覆大地，白雪覆盖一切，再由黑翼披上寿衣。

String.Source: Hm?
String.Dest: 嗯？

String.Source: And the braggart did swagger and brandish his blade, as he told of bold battles and gold he had made!
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】他气势汹汹挥舞着他的剑，吹嘘英勇事迹神气活现！

String.Source: The bard told me I was a natural. But I still feel rather clumsy with it. Sometimes I feel like it's lost all patience with my fingers.
String.Dest: 那个诗人说我很有天赋。但我仍感觉自己相当笨拙。有时我觉得自己都快对自己的手指失去信心了。

String.Source: But then he went quiet, did Ragnar the Red, when he met the shield-maiden Matilda who said;
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】红衣拉格纳后来变了哑巴，全因他遇到盾牌女仆玛提尔达，她说……

String.Source: Greetings.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: But...I don't like the sound of my own voice. Then again, nobody likes the way their voice sounds. Not even bards.
String.Dest: 但...我不喜欢我自己的声音。可是话又说回来，没人会喜欢自己的声音。即便是吟遊诗人。

String.Source: Um, can...can I help you?
String.Dest: 嗯，我...我能帮助你吗？

String.Source: And my friends have all said that I have a great singing voice. I suppose they should, because that's what friends do.
String.Dest: 我的朋友都说我有一个美妙的歌喉。我想他们应该这么说，因为我们是朋友。

String.Source: Just the lute. Can you imagine me on the drum? (laughs) I can't.
String.Dest: 只是弹鲁特琴啦。你能想象我敲鼓的样子吗？(笑声) 至少我不能。

String.Source: Oh, sweet taffy treats, I did it again, didn't I.
String.Dest: 噢，甜蜜的招待呢，我又做到了，不是吗。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: It's a cranky old thing, and is quick to get out of tune...but when it's right, it can sing as beautifully as any other.
String.Dest: 这是个古怪的老玩意，而且它还会很快走调,,,不过等它被调试好的时候它能和别人唱的一样好。

String.Source: And the braggart named Ragnar was boastful no more! When his ugly red head rolled around on the floor!
String.Dest: 【歌词待校对】自大狂拉格纳再也没法在那吹牛了！因为他那丑陋的红毛脑袋掉在地上摔成了一堆渣！
